location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.270 of 1852 from the Residency in the Persian Gulf, to Mr Francis Ruffary, Supercargo of the British merchant ship Despatch, Cochin

mods.abstract: Letter informing of further funds (seventy Tomans) paid by the Governor of Bushire, on account of losses sustained by Ruffary when purchasing wheat at Bunder Reg, to make up the cargo of the Despatch'after the intrigues of certain individuals of this town'.
